lead_paragraph: Australia fast bowler John Hastings has been withdrawn from a one-day tri-series against West Indies and South Africa in the Caribbean after undergoing surgery on his ankle.

headline.print_headline: Australia's Hastings Out of West Indies Tour
headline.main: Australia's Hastings Out of West Indies Tour

snippet: Australia fast bowler John Hastings has been withdrawn from a one-day tri-series against West Indies and South Africa in the Caribbean after undergoing surgery on his ankle....
